sources.title: Hard Hombre
sources.description: When Peaceful Patton goes to work at the Martini ranch he is mistaken for the notorious outlaw the Hard Hombre. This enables him to force the ranchers to divide up the water rights. But he is in trouble when his mother arrives and exposes the hoax. You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: The Hard Hombre (1931) HOOT GIBSON
sources.description:
Stars: Hoot Gibson, Lina Basquette, Mathilde Comont
Director: Otto Brower

When Peaceful Patton goes to work at the Martini ranch he is mistaken for the notorious outlaw the Hard Hombre. This enables him to force the ranchers to divide up the water rights. But he is in trouble when his mother arrives and exposes the hoax.
